author: James Martin
method: Preheat the oven to 220C/425F/Gas 7. Heat the oil in a medium ovenproof, non-stick frying pan. Add the shallot and sauté for 2 minutes, to soften.  Add the cavolo nero and the pepper and cook for a further 3-4 minutes. Add the eggs and cook over a low heat until the egg has set. Crumble the cheese over the top and then transfer to the oven and cook for 5-6 minutes, until the cheese has melted and is golden. To serve, remove from the oven, and carefully transfer onto a serving plate, cheese side upwards.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil,  ½ shallot, peeled and sliced,  85g/3oz cavolo nero (black-leaf kale), chopped,  ½ red romero pepper, seeds removed and sliced,  5 eggs, beaten,  55g/2oz Pont l'Évêque cheese
